fields.content:
Welcome to the MARCO Portal Marine Planner!

Updated December, 2016

The MARCO Portal Marine Planner tool is a spatial data explorer and decision support tool for the coastal and marine areas of the Mid Atlantic cost of the USA.

By clicking "Agree", you are acknowledging the following statements:

  • Data and analyses presented within the MARCO Portal Marine Planner are based on best available information, and are expected to be updated regularly.
  • Many layers are not maintained by MARCO itself, but come from a variety of trusted sources.
  • Some data layers may be summarized to preserve confidentiality of sensitive information.
  • Documentation for layers should be used to better understand the data being presented.

I have read this disclaimer and understand the intent of this system, and therefore hold MARCO harmless from any liability arising from or related to using the MARCO Portal Marine Planner tool.
